original_title: More than 2,000 National Guard troops deployed to Washington for crime mission | Fox News
article_summary: "Six states, including Ohio, West Virginia, and South Carolina, have pledged to send National Guard troops to aid President Trump's crime crackdown in Washington, D.C., bringing the total participation to over 2,000 troops. The troops will support the D.C. National Guard in deterring crime and protecting federal assets."</s>
